  Hey y'all. This is gonna be a short one. My post about Arborium ended up doing severals. By this I mean it was briefly the number 1 post on Lobste.rs, which is an invite-only diet orange site. Thankfully, I've only received a small amount of harassment from this. Anyways Netrunner card reviews coming soon.

Hey y'all. This is gonna be a short one. My [post about Arborium](https://ewie.online/posts/20260214-arborium-is-ai-slopw/) ended up doing severals. By this I mean it was briefly the number 1 post on [Lobste.rs](https://lobste.rs/s/unpaan/arborium_is_ai_slopware_should_not_be), which is an invite-only diet orange site. Thankfully, I've only received a small amount of harassment from this. Anyways Netrunner card reviews coming soon.
